welcome_message_body: Welcome to Miramar, where sunny beaches and vibrant cultural attractions await you. Take in the city's charm and enjoy our beautiful parks, diverse dining options, and rich history. We invite you to explore and make the most of your time in our lovely city.

restaurants.name: Nanni Cocinero
restaurants.description: Nanni Cocinero is a mediterranean restaurant located in Miramar.

restaurants.name: Ristorante El Pescador Romano
restaurants.description: Ristorante El Pescador Romano is a seafood restaurant located in Miramar.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Opa Locka Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
